channel.title: Nicolas M. Careau - Developer and technologist
channel.description: Recent content on Nicolas M. Careau - Developer and technologist

item.title: Lead IT & DevOps
item.description: Manage a team that develops and maintain a state-of-the-art infrastructure. System architecture and logistic management. International studio and triple A projects

item.title: Senior I.T. Specialist - DevOps
item.description: Support a game studio with all IT related tasks Develop, build and manage tools and servers for day to day uses Build and maintain Continuous integration systems Worked on games like Borderlands 3

item.title: Udata
item.description: Enterprise developping software to manage companies forms and data. Developers of rpa360.com

item.title: Mikro Watch
item.description: Small application to fetch and parse accounting data from Mikrotik routers and send them to InfluxDB.
